patthana21.42:1.1_0: Nasappaṭighaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaṭigho sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana21.42:2.1_0: Naappaṭighaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaṭigho sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana21.42:3.1_0: Nasappaṭighaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca naappaṭighaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaṭigho
patthana21.42:4.1_0: Nasappaṭighaṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaṭigho anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.42:5.1_0: Naappaṭighaṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appaṭigho anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
